instructions: From any home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Under 'DEVICE,' tap Battery . Tap the Menu icon in the top right. Tap Battery saver . Tap the Battery saver switch to on or off.

From any home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Under 'DEVICE,' tap Battery . Tap the Menu icon in the top right. Tap Battery saver . Tap the Battery saver switch to on. Tap to set level when Battery saver comes on automatically: Never at 5% battery at 15% battery

From any home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Under 'DEVICE,' tap Battery . Tap the Menu icon in the top right. Tap Battery optimization . Tap to set optimization level: Not optimized All apps
